channel.title: Announcements on Events going on in Wells, Glastonbury, Shepton Mallet, etc. in Somerset, UK

item.title: Public Demo of Wells Community Jobs website
item.description:
Warning: Website is a work-in-progress! Information may be incorrect or outdated.

We have launched the Wells Community Jobs website public demo! More features are coming soon:

item.title: Launch of Wells Community Jobs website
item.description: Welcome to the Wells Community Jobs website! Run by volunteers with unofficial connections, we seek to catalogue and advertise job opportunities in the Wells, Somerset area.

item.title: Beware Fake Jobcentreplus Online
item.description: While researching, I found that there’s a fake JobCentrePlus Twitter account. Avoid @JobCenterPlus, it is a troll account. Here is a list of legitimate job-centre accounts:
